title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Improving Blended Learning Satisfaction Among Executives

context.prior_knowledge: Core Business Concepts and Work Experience
context.additional_context: Social studies training program for working professionals conducted in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can utilize self-directed learning strategies with at least 80% accuracy in a blended learning environment.
Learners evaluate online/offline learning satisfaction at 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) based on the course design and instructor support system.
Learners can concretely present at least three anticipated career development elements after completing the training.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
